headline.main: DOROTHY STICKNEY GETS STAGE PRIZE; Barter Theatre Award for Performance Is Presented byMrs. F.D. RooseveltNEW PROJECT DISCLOSEDAbingdon, Va., Director Tellsof Proposed First State Theatre in U.S.

lead_paragraph: Dorothy Stickney, whose portrayal of Vinnie in the leading feminine role in "Life With Father" was voted by a committee of judges the outstanding performance by an American actor during the 19391940 theatre season in New York, received yesterday from Mrs. Franklin D. Roosevelt the second annual Barter Theatre Award.
